title: Awesome List Updates on Oct 04, 2024

items.title: Awesome Generative Deep Art
items.content_text:
### Critical Views about Generative AI

*   [Critique of Generative AI Can Harm Learning Study Design  by Steffi Tan, Vaikunthan Rajaratnam :: SSRN](https://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers.cfm?abstract_id=4898213)
*   [Generative AI Can Harm Learning by Hamsa Bastani, Osbert Bastani, Alp Sungu, Haosen Ge, Özge Kabakcı, Rei Mariman :: SSRN](https://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers.cfm?abstract_id=4895486)
items.content_html:
Critical Views about Generative AI

  • Critique of Generative AI Can Harm Learning Study Design  by Steffi Tan, Vaikunthan Rajaratnam :: SSRN
  • Generative AI Can Harm Learning by Hamsa Bastani, Osbert Bastani, Alp Sungu, Haosen Ge, Özge Kabakcı, Rei Mariman :: SSRN

items.title: Awesome Dash
items.content_text:
### Deployment

*   [Ploomber Cloud](https://ploomber.io) - The community plan allows free deployments

### Component Libraries

*   [Dash PDF (⭐24)](https://github.com/ploomber/dash-pdf) - Display inline PDFs
*   [Dash MUI (⭐17)](https://github.com/ploomber/dash-mui) - Material UI components
*   [Dash React Simple Maps (⭐8)](https://github.com/ploomber/dash-react-simple-maps) - Create interactive maps
*   [Dash Mosaic (⭐14)](https://github.com/ploomber/mosaic-python#dash-mosaic) - Display [Mosaic (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/uwdata/mosaic) plots
*   [Dash Tabler Icons (⭐6)](https://github.com/ploomber/dash-tabler-icons) - Beautiful icons for your Dash apps
*   [Dash React Syntax Highlighter (⭐1)](https://github.com/ploomber/dash-react-syntax-highlighter) - Display code snippets with a copy button

### Contributors

*   [Eduardo Blancas](https://github.com/edublancas)
items.content_html:
Deployment

  • Ploomber Cloud - The community plan allows free deployments

Component Libraries

  • Dash PDF (⭐24) - Display inline PDFs
  • Dash MUI (⭐17) - Material UI components
  • Dash React Simple Maps (⭐8) - Create interactive maps
  • Dash Mosaic (⭐14) - Display Mosaic (⭐1.1k) plots
  • Dash Tabler Icons (⭐6) - Beautiful icons for your Dash apps
  • Dash React Syntax Highlighter (⭐1) - Display code snippets with a copy button

Contributors

  • Eduardo Blancas

items.title: Awesome Go
items.content_text:
### Generators

*   [goderive (⭐1.3k)](https://github.com/awalterschulze/goderive) - Derives functions from input types

### Reflection

*   [copy (⭐51)](https://github.com/gotidy/copy) - Package for fast copying structs of different types.
*   [Deepcopier (⭐458)](https://github.com/ulule/deepcopier) - Simple struct copying for Go.
*   [go-deepcopy (⭐100)](https://github.com/tiendc/go-deepcopy) - Fast deep copy library.
*   [goenum (⭐14)](https://github.com/lvyahui8/goenum) - A common enumeration struct based on generics and reflection that allows you to quickly define enumerations and use a set of useful default methods.
*   [gotype (⭐63)](https://github.com/wzshiming/gotype) - Golang source code parsing, usage like reflect package.
*   [gpath (⭐40)](https://github.com/tenntenn/gpath) - Library to simplify access struct fields with Go's expression in reflection.
*   [objwalker (⭐3)](https://github.com/rekby/objwalker) - Walk by go objects with reflection.
*   [reflectutils (⭐8)](https://github.com/muir/reflectutils) - Helpers for working with reflection: struct tag parsing; recursive walking; fill value from string.
items.content_html:
Generators

  • goderive (⭐1.3k) - Derives functions from input types

Reflection

  • copy (⭐51) - Package for fast copying structs of different types.
  • Deepcopier (⭐458) - Simple struct copying for Go.
  • go-deepcopy (⭐100) - Fast deep copy library.
  • goenum (⭐14) - A common enumeration struct based on generics and reflection that allows you to quickly define enumerations and use a set of useful default methods.
  • gotype (⭐63) - Golang source code parsing, usage like reflect package.
  • gpath (⭐40) - Library to simplify access struct fields with Go's expression in reflection.
  • objwalker (⭐3) - Walk by go objects with reflection.
  • reflectutils (⭐8) - Helpers for working with reflection: struct tag parsing; recursive walking; fill value from string.

items.title: Awesome Blazor
items.content_text:
### Books / Others

*   [Building Blazor Applications: A Developer's Guide](https://www.amazon.com/Building-Blazor-Applications-Developers-Guide/dp/B0DDBG4S3Q/ref=sims_dp_d_dex_ai_speed_loc_mtl_v5_t1_d_sccl_1_2/136-3795973-8719321?pd_rd_w=coqfA\&content-id=amzn1.sym.da3a5e11-8f5f-413b-a68b-31ceac43c758\&pf_rd_p=da3a5e11-8f5f-413b-a68b-31ceac43c758\&pf_rd_r=9Q8447GTE9QT4WTPH5Z6\&pd_rd_wg=IAqx1\&pd_rd_r=ff570237-8604-4432-b4cd-a726ce880b23\&pd_rd_i=B0DDBG4S3Q\&psc=1) - Building Blazor Applications: A Developer's Guide (Published August 14, 2024).
*   [Mastering Blazor UI: Advanced Custom Components and Design Strategies](https://www.amazon.com/Mastering-Blazor-UI-Components-Strategies/dp/B0DG2RJD1R/ref=sr_1_1?crid=SK6RU9T2BOGD\&dib=eyJ2IjoiMSJ9.s5wnoFiu-YggQzMUNkXdPUUkrmyKJs-ffmHU1vbgjlJYGeFcYE04oohzd7hcoj9zCTyfe-R07XyKNQvyU5t7Mw.NRJ3TXh3AQZpXwXQmV5IoCPC9y1T-ybHWaoO9G9DvFY\&dib_tag=se\&keywords=blazor+gallivan\&qid=1728060552\&s=books\&sprefix=blazor+gallivan%2Cstripbooks%2C127\&sr=1-1) - Mastering Blazor UI: Advanced Custom Components and Design Strategies (Published September 3, 2024).
items.content_html:
Books / Others

  • Building Blazor Applications: A Developer's Guide - Building Blazor Applications: A Developer's Guide (Published August 14, 2024).
  • Mastering Blazor UI: Advanced Custom Components and Design Strategies - Mastering Blazor UI: Advanced Custom Components and Design Strategies (Published September 3, 2024).

items.title: Awesome Jquery
items.content_text:
### UI / Paid Books

*   [macon (⭐4)](https://github.com/LoganTann/macon) - Tiny utility (430B) to create reactive jquery components using a JSX-like syntax.
items.content_html:
UI / Paid Books

  • macon (⭐4) - Tiny utility (430B) to create reactive jquery components using a JSX-like syntax.

items.title: Awesome Audit Algorithms
items.content_text:
### Papers / 2024

*   [LLMs hallucinate graphs too: a structural perspective](https://arxiv.org/abs/2409.00159) - (complex networks) *Queries LLMs for known graphs and studies topological hallucinations. Proposes a structural hallucination rank.*
items.content_html:
Papers / 2024

  • LLMs hallucinate graphs too: a structural perspective - (complex networks) Queries LLMs for known graphs and studies topological hallucinations. Proposes a structural hallucination rank.

items.title: Awesome Webxr
items.content_text:

*   [iR Engine (⭐76)](https://github.com/ir-engine/ir-engine) - A full stack MMO engine built on three.js and bitECS with support for WebXR.
items.content_html:

items.title: Awesome Vite
items.content_text:

items.content_html:
Framework-agnostic Plugins / Bundling

items.title: Awesome Python Data Science
items.content_text:
### Data Validation / Synthetic Data

*   [DataComPy (⭐579)](https://github.com/capitalone/datacompy)- A library to compare Pandas, Polars, and Spark data frames. It provides stats and lets users adjust for match accuracy.
items.content_html:
Data Validation / Synthetic Data

  • DataComPy (⭐579)- A library to compare Pandas, Polars, and Spark data frames. It provides stats and lets users adjust for match accuracy.

items.title: Awesome Polars
items.content_text:
### Talks and videos / Miscellaneous

*   [Polars with Plotly](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=slq4VhUxtCc) ⏳ 19 min - A video that shows the usage of Polars with the Plotly graphic library by [Plotly](https://plotly.com/).  <>
*   [Polars and time series | PyData 2024](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qz-zAHBz6Ks) ⏳ 29 min - A video that shows how to use Polars effectively for time series analysis iby [@MarcoGorelli](https://github.com/MarcoGorelli).
items.content_html:
Talks and videos / Miscellaneous

  • Polars with Plotly ⏳ 19 min - A video that shows the usage of Polars with the Plotly graphic library by Plotly. <>
  • Polars and time series | PyData 2024 ⏳ 29 min - A video that shows how to use Polars effectively for time series analysis iby @MarcoGorelli.

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### Carousels / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-stories (⭐19)](https://github.com/Gauravdarkslayer/ngx-stories) - An Angular component to render Instagram like stories.

### Layout Components / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-bottom-sheet (⭐5)](https://github.com/ArslanAmeer/ngx-bottom-sheet) - A highly customizable and lightweight Angular service that provides a mobile-friendly bottom sheet component.

### Markdown / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-md (⭐265)](https://github.com/dimpu/ngx-md) - Angular directive for parsing markdown content in your web application.

### Mixed utilities / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-lift (⭐6)](https://github.com/wghglory/ngx-lift) - This project has been crafted to enhance and simplify your Angular development experience. In the dynamic web development landscape, Angular stands out as a robust framework, and `ngx-lift` and `clr-lift` complement it by offering a collection of utilities, operators, and components.

### Misc Components / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-copypaste (⭐29)](https://github.com/JsDaddy/ngx-copypaste) - A pure and awesome copy paste directive for Angular.
items.content_html:
Carousels / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-stories (⭐19) - An Angular component to render Instagram like stories.

Layout Components / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-bottom-sheet (⭐5) - A highly customizable and lightweight Angular service that provides a mobile-friendly bottom sheet component.

Markdown / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-md (⭐265) - Angular directive for parsing markdown content in your web application.

Mixed utilities / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-lift (⭐6) - This project has been crafted to enhance and simplify your Angular development experience. In the dynamic web development landscape, Angular stands out as a robust framework, and ngx-lift and clr-lift complement it by offering a collection of utilities, operators, and components.

Misc Components / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-copypaste (⭐29) - A pure and awesome copy paste directive for Angular.
